children.name: errors
groupId
children.text: String
children.text2: Sys_id of the Configuration Management Database (CMDB) group.

children.name: Output
Example
children.text: // Script example: var getAllCIFunc = function(groupSysId) { var parser = new JSONParser(); var response = sn_cmdbgroup.CMDBGroupAPI.getAllCI(groupSysId, false); var parsed = parser.parse(response); if (parsed.result) { gs.info("succeed to retrieve ci list: " + parsed.idList); } else { gs.info("fail to retrieve list, errors: " + JSON.stringify(parsed.errors)); } } var groupExists = "d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4"; var groupContainsInvalidSavedQuery = "e685a2c3d7012200de92a5f75e610387"; getAllCIFunc(groupExists); getAllCIFunc(groupContainsInvalidSavedQuery);

children.name: errors.error
children.text:
Error name.
Possible values:
  • GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND
  • GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_EMPTY
  • FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_CI_PAIR
  • FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_QUERY_ID_PAIR
  • CI_CAN_NOT_FOUND
  • SAVED_QUERY_ID_NOT_FOUND
  • ERROR_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY
  • TIMEOUT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY
  • NOT_COMPLETE_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY
  • MAX_LIMIT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY
  • GROUP_API_TIMEOUT
  • EXCEPTION_FROM_EXECUTE_QUERY
  • SOME_CI_NOT_VISIBLE_DUE_TO_SECURITY_CONSTRAINT

Data type: String

children.name: requireCompleteSet
children.text: Boolean
children.text2:
Optional, but must be passed if requireAllQueryNodesCis is passed.

Flag that indicates whether an empty string is returned if any CIs are filtered out by access control list (ACL) restrictions.

Valid values:
  • true: Return empty string.
  • false: Don't return value.

Default: false

children.name: errors.message
children.text:
Brief description of the error message.

Data type: String

children.name: requireAllQueryNodesCis
children.text: Boolean
children.text2:
Optional. Flag that indicates whether to return CIs from all CMDB classes of the query.
Valid values:
  • true: Return CIs from all columns.
  • false: Only return CIs from the starting node of the query builder query.

Default: false

children.name: idList
children.text:
List of CMDB CI sys_ids.

Data type: Array

children.name: partialCIListDueToACLFlag
children.text:
Flag that indicates if the list of returned CIs is incomplete due to ACL restrictions.
Note: This is not considered an error condition, and no corresponding error information is returned.

Data type: Boolean

Valid values:
  • true: idList is incomplete.
  • false: idList is complete.

children.name: result
children.text:
Flag that indicates whether the method completed successfully.
Possible values:
  • true: Success
  • false: Error

children.name: getAllCI(String groupId, Boolean requireCompleteSet, Boolean requireAllQueryNodesCis)
children.text:
Returns all configuration items (CIs) for the specified group. The results include all
    manual CIs and the list of CIs from the query builder's saved query.

children.name: errors
Output
Example
children.text: // Script example: var getAllCIFromQueryBuilderFunc = function(groupSysId) { var parser = new JSONParser(); var response = sn_cmdbgroup.CMDBGroupAPI.getAllCIFromQueryBuilder(groupSysId, false); var parsed = parser.parse(response); if (parsed.result) { gs.info("succeed to retrieve ci list: " + parsed.idList); } else { gs.info("fail to retrieve list, errors: " + JSON.stringify(parsed.errors)); } } var groupExists = "d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4"; var groupContainsInvalidSavedQuery = "e685a2c3d7012200de92a5f75e610387"; getAllCIFromQueryBuilderFunc(groupExists); getAllCIFromQueryBuilderFunc(groupContainsInvalidSavedQuery);

children.name: groupId
children.text: String
children.text2: Sys_id of the Configuration Management Database (CMDB) group.

children.name: requireCompleteSet
children.text: Boolean
children.text2:
Optional, but must be passed if requireAllQueryNodesCis is passed.

Flag that indicates whether an empty string is returned if any CIs are filtered out by access control list (ACL) restrictions.

Valid values:
  • true: Return empty string.
  • false: Don't return value.

Default: false

children.name: getAllCIFromQueryBuilder(String groupId, Boolean requireCompleteSet, Boolean requireAllQueryNodesCis)
children.text:
Returns all configuration items (CIs) returned from all saved query builders' query IDs
    for the specified group.

children.name: groupId
children.text: String
children.text2: The sysId of the CMDB group.

children.name: Output
children.text:
succeed to retrieve ci 
list: 6b43105c37301000deeabfc8bcbe5db2,2dfd7c8437201000deeabfc8bcbe5d56
fail to retrieve list, errors: 
[{"message":"Group does not exist","error":"GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND"}]

children.name: Example
children.text: // Script example for requireCompleteSet being false: var getManualCIList = function(groupSysId) { var parser = new JSONParser(); var response = sn_cmdbgroup.CMDBGroupAPI.getManualCIList(groupSysId, false); var parsed = parser.parse(response); if (parsed.result) { gs.info("succeed to retrieve ci list: " + parsed.idList); } else { gs.info("fail to retrieve list, errors: " + JSON.stringify(parsed.errors)); } } // create a group in cmdb_group, and add CIs to this group in Edit Manual CI form var groupExists = "d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4"; // use a non-exist group var groupDoesNotExists = "d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4111"; getManualCIList(groupExists); getManualCIList(groupDoesNotExists);

children.name: String
children.text:
A JSON formated string in the format 
{ 'result':false, 
'errors':[ {'message':'Group does not exist',
            'error':'GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND'},
 { } // another error if it exists 
 ], 
'partialCIListDueToACLFlag':false,
'idList':['sys_id_1', 'sys_id2'] }
Where
  • result - a boolean flag. When true the method was successful.
  • errors - a list of errors with a message and error code.
  • partialCIListDueToACLFlag -  a Boolean flag. When true, the idList is incomplete due to an ACL restriction. When false, the idList is complete.
  • idList - an array of cmdb_ci sys_ids

When not successful, returns one of the errors GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND, GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_EMPTY, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_CI_PAIR, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_QUERY_ID_PAIR, CI_CAN_NOT_FOUND, SAVED_QUERY_ID_NOT_FOUND, ERROR_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, TIMEOUT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, NOT_COMPLETE_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, MAX_LIMIT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, GROUP_API_TIMEOUT, EXCEPTION_FROM_EXECUTE_QUERY, SOME_CI_NOT_VISIBLE_DUE_TO_SECURITY_CONSTRAINT

children.name: Output
children.text:
fail to retrieve list, errors: 
[{"message":"Some CI(s) not visible due to security constraint",
"error":"SOME_CI_NOT_VISIBLE_DUE_TO_SECURITY_CONSTRAINT"}]

children.name: Example
children.text: // Script example for requireCompleteSet being true var getManualCIList = function(groupSysId) { var parser = new JSONParser(); var response = sn_cmdbgroup.CMDBGroupAPI.getManualCIList(groupSysId, true); var parsed = parser.parse(response); if (parsed.result) { gs.info("succeed to retrieve ci list: " + parsed.idList); } else { gs.info("fail to retrieve list, errors: " + JSON.stringify(parsed.errors)); } } // create a group in cmdb_group, and add CIs to this group in Edit Manual CI form var groupExists = "d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4"; getManualCIList(groupExists);

children.name: requireCompleteSet
children.text: Boolean
children.text2:
When true, returns an error string if any CIs are filtered out by ACL
                restrictions.

children.name: getManualCIList(String groupId, Boolean requireCompleteSet)
children.text: Returns the CMDB group's manual CI list.

children.name: groupId
children.text: String
children.text2: The sysId of the CMDB group.

children.text:

Where

  • idList - an array of cmdb_ci sys_ids

When not successful, returns one of the errors GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND, GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_EMPTY, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_CI_PAIR, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_QUERY_ID_PAIR, CI_CAN_NOT_FOUND, SAVED_QUERY_ID_NOT_FOUND, ERROR_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, TIMEOUT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, NOT_COMPLETE_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, MAX_LIMIT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, GROUP_API_TIMEOUT, EXCEPTION_FROM_EXECUTE_QUERY, SOME_CI_NOT_VISIBLE_DUE_TO_SECURITY_CONSTRAINT

children.text2:
When true, returns an empty string if any CIs are filtered out by ACL

children.name: getSavedQueryIdList(String groupId, Boolean requireCompleteSet)
children.text: Returns the query builder's query IDs for the specified CMDB group.

 { } // another error if it exists 
 ], 
'partialCIListDueToACLFlag':false,

  • partialCIListDueToACLFlag -  a Boolean flag. When true, the idList is incomplete due to an ACL restriction. When false, the idList is complete.
  • idList - an array of cmdb_ci sys_ids

When not successful, returns one of the errors GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND, GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_EMPTY, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_CI_PAIR, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_QUERY_ID_PAIR, CI_CAN_NOT_FOUND, SAVED_QUERY_ID_NOT_FOUND, ERROR_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, TIMEOUT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, NOT_COMPLETE_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, MAX_LIMIT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, GROUP_API_TIMEOUT, EXCEPTION_FROM_EXECUTE_QUERY, SOME_CI_NOT_VISIBLE_DUE_TO_SECURITY_CONSTRAINT

children.name: Output
children.text:
succeed to set manual ci list
fail to set manual ci list, errors: [{"message":"Group does not exist","error":
"GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND"}]

children.name: Example
children.text: // Script example: var setManualCIListFunc = function(groupSysId, manualCIList) { var parser = new JSONParser(); var response = sn_cmdbgroup.CMDBGroupAPI.setManualCIList(groupSysId, manualCIList); var parsed = parser.parse(response); if (parsed.result) { gs.info("succeed to set manual ci list"); } else { gs.info("fail to set manual ci list, errors: " + JSON.stringify(parsed.errors)); } } var group = "d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4"; var groupDoesNotExist = "1234"; var manualCIList = "b4fd7c8437201000deeabfc8bcbe5dc1, affd3c8437201000deeabfc8bcbe5dc3"; setManualCIListFunc(group, manualCIList); setManualCIListFunc(groupDoesNotExist, manualCIList);

children.name: groupId
children.text: String
children.text2: The sysId of the CMDB group.

children.name: ciSysIds
children.text: String
children.text2: Comma separated list of CI sysIds.

children.name: setManualCIList(String groupId, String ciSysIds)
children.text:
Sets the manual CI list for the specified group. The existing manual CI list is
    overwritten. CI sysIds not found in the cmdb_ci table are ignored.

children.name: Output
children.text:
succeed to set saved query id list
fail to set saved query id list, errors: [{"message":
"Saved query id(b4fd7c8437201000deeabfc8bcbe5dc1) is not found for 
group(d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4)","error":
"SAVED_QUERY_ID_NOT_FOUND"},{"message":
"Saved query id(affd3c8437201000deeabfc8bcbe5dc3) is not found for 
group(d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4)","error":"SAVED_QUERY_ID_NOT_FOUND"}]

children.name: Example
children.text: // Script example: var setSavedQueryIdListFunc = function(groupSysId, queryIdList) { var parser = new JSONParser(); var response = sn_cmdbgroup.CMDBGroupAPI.setSavedQueryIdList(groupSysId, queryIdList); var parsed = parser.parse(response); if (parsed.result) { gs.info("succeed to set saved query id list"); } else { gs.info("fail to set saved query id list, errors: " + JSON.stringify(parsed.errors)); } } var group = "d0d2d25113152200eef2dd828144b0e4"; var savedQueryBuilderIdList = "394585fed7812200de92a5f75e6103e8"; var savedQueryBuilderIdNotExistList = "b4fd7c8437201000deeabfc8bcbe5dc1, affd3c8437201000deeabfc8bcbe5dc3"; setSavedQueryIdListFunc(group, savedQueryBuilderIdList); setSavedQueryIdListFunc(group, savedQueryBuilderIdNotExistList);

children.text:
A JSON formated string in the format 
{ 'result':false, 
'errors':[ {'message':'Group does not exist',
            'error':'GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND'},
 { } // another error if it exists 
 ], 
'partialCIListDueToACLFlag':false,
'idList':['sys_id_1', 'sys_id2'] }
Where
  • result - a boolean flag. When true the method was successful.
  • errors - a list of errors with a message and error code.
  • partialCIListDueToACLFlag -  a Boolean flag. When true, the idList is incomplete due to an ACL restriction. When false, the idList is complete.
  • idList - an array of cmdb_ci sys_ids

When not successful, returns one of the errors GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_NOT_FOUND, GROUP_SYS_ID_IS_EMPTY, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_CI_PAIR, FAIL_TO_INSERT_GROUP_QUERY_ID_PAIR, CI_CAN_NOT_FOUND, SAVED_QUERY_ID_NOT_FOUND, ERROR_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, TIMEOUT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, NOT_COMPLETE_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, MAX_LIMIT_DURING_QUERY_BUILDER_PROCESS_QUERY, GROUP_API_TIMEOUT, EXCEPTION_FROM_EXECUTE_QUERY, SOME_CI_NOT_VISIBLE_DUE_TO_SECURITY_CONSTRAINT

children.name: groupId
children.text: String
children.text2: The sysId of the CMDB group.

children.name: queryIds
children.text: String
children.text2: Comma separated list of saved query sysIds.

children.name: setSavedQueryIdList(String groupId, String queryIds)
children.text:
Sets the saved query ID list for the specified group. The existing query ID list is
    overwritten. Query sysIds not found in the qb_saved_query table are ignored.

name: CMDBGroupAPI
text: The CMDBGroupAPI provides methods for performing actions on Configuration Management Database (CMDB) groups.
text2:
The CMDBGroupAPI is a scoped static class. To use the class you must include the namespace identifier sn_cmdbgroup before the CMDBGroupAPI object. For example:
var response = sn_cmdbgroup.CMDBGroupAPI.getManualCIList(groupSysId, false);


To access this API you must have the itil or asset role.
